meanings.definition: Showing a tendency to be irritable or unpleasant
meanings.sent1: She always has the bitchiest expression on her face.
meanings.sent2: The cat gave me the bitchiest look when I tried to pet it.
meanings.sent3: Even the grumpy old dog couldn't match her bitchiest mood.
meanings.sent4: Her complaints reached the bitchiest level when the coffee machine broke.
meanings.sent5: The stormy sky had the bitchiest shade of gray I had ever seen.

meanings.definition: Characterized by malicious or spiteful behavior
meanings.sent1: Her gossip was the bitchiest in the whole town.
meanings.sent2: He made the bitchiest comment about her new haircut.
meanings.sent3: The witch in the story had the bitchiest cackle imaginable.
meanings.sent4: The villain's plan was the bitchiest scheme ever devised.
meanings.sent5: The internet troll left the bitchiest remarks on every post.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the most unpleasant or difficult situation or task
meanings.sent1: Cleaning the attic was the bitchiest chore of all.
meanings.sent2: The final exam was the bitchiest test we had all year.
meanings.sent3: The traffic jam on Friday evening was the bitchiest I had ever seen.
meanings.sent4: Finding a parking spot in the crowded city was the bitchiest challenge.
meanings.sent5: The broken elevator made climbing the stairs the bitchiest option.
